projects.title: React Carousel Component
projects.description: A custom carousel component modeled after YouTube. Built from scratch with React.
projects.alt: Phill Aelony React Components - React component modeled after YouTube carousel.

projects.title: IP Address Tracker
projects.description: Type in an IP address or domain name to view it's location on the map.
projects.alt: Phill Aelony Javascript app - an IP address tracker that uses 2 APIs to show location of IP address on map.

projects.title: Alpaca Pong
projects.description: Pong re-imagined with alpacas and an original soundtrack. Made with pure JavaScript.
projects.alt: Phill Aelony Javascript game - This game was made with pure Javascript on an HTML canvas. Original music and sound design by Phill Aelony.
